title: 4 Monitor Fitness
description: Website for fit coders to store their favorite exercises in workouts, and find new exercises for future workouts

title: Table Top Warriors
description: Website for trading card enthusiasts to store their deck collections for the trading card games Pokemon, YuGiOh, and Magic The Gathering.

title: Crypto Watcher
description: Website for tracking the current value of various crypotcurrencies. Users can search any cryptocurrency and are presented with its current value and ranking.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Website that allows users to look up the current weather conditions for a certain area.

title: Taskmaster Pro
description: A kanban board application that allows users to filter tasks by category including: To Do, In Progress, In Review, and Done

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: Application that allows users to schedule their work day by the hour to improve efficiency.

title: Note Taker
description: Application that allows users to write down notes. Notes are saved to the browser and can be deleted
